item.title: GnuPG: how to backup and restore your keys?
item.description: Recently, I had to transfer my private keys to a different computer. Since this looks like a trivial task (it was my first time doing it), I have decided to search for a “how-to” blog post that details the steps required for this task. After a few minutes, I got shocked that it seems to be a task that people don’t usually do, they seem to transfer only one key at once, never the whole key-ring.
